name: Whimsical Conversations
description:
Whimsical Conversations (Also known as Four Acts, Two People, One Place.) is a game made in RPG Maker MV, self-describe as "semi-kinetic novel" that consist of four chapters or acts based on a stageplay collection Love Cafe Project by Dr. Joem Antonio. This story will be more accurate version from Antonio's native script than my own version (previously developed as PROJECT: LOVE + CAFE). The game's language will be native as Filipino only, yet the English language is not available. The first gameplay test title is "Cancerous Kang Carrot Ka".

Unlike my own version, most of the cartoony/popular culture references were longer involved and converts into more theater-style approach as well as more features will added include Visual Novel-style menu button system, Picture Thumbnail Save/Load System, and Backlog System.

NOTE: Semi-kinetic novel is only focusing on nonlinear plot with different main characters as the player does not interact with the story such as branching choices and multiple endings.
